subject: Football
Scholarships and Fellowships
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When Jadeveon Clowney, a defensive end from Rock Hill, S.C., who is widely considered the nation’s top recruit, put off his decision on a college until Feb. 14, it may have helped Clemson’s chances.
snippet: When Jadeveon Clowney, a defensive end from Rock Hill, S.C., who is widely considered the nation’s top recruit, put off his decision on a college until Feb. 14, it may have helped Clemson’s chances.
